Class Prop

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Prop

public abstract class Prop
extends greenfoot.Actor

Represents a "Prop" (or Property) in the world such as a wall or beeper. The act method of a Prop does nothing.

Version:
1.0 (Greenfoot) January 2010
Author:
Joseph Bergin
